title: Sunni Insurgency Threatens To Plunge Iraq Into Sectarian War
teaser: Islamist Sunni militants reportedly control most of Iraq's largest oil refinery, as they vow to push on to Baghdad. Meanwhile, there is a growing call for Prime Minister Nouri al Maliki to step down.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
